attributes.action: Do not allow divorced fathers to become "divorced from their children."
attributes.additional_details: Stop the justice system enforcing the idea that divorced fathers only have the parental rights they can afford to pay to enforce. The default position should be that fathers (unless they be demonstrably unfit parents) have EQUAL rights as parents - and should not have to pay exorbitant legal fees to ensure that their children do not grow up not knowing their own father. For the sake of the children in our country.
